content:
Bhaagyavathee mrthiyaalaakaasham dhanyatha paaram praapichu
Bhoolokam paavanagaathratthin-samskaaraal paavanamaayi
/tvaanavamaanavaranyonyam
/tmellichathyaamodatthil
/tchaale ninnettam shuddhyaa
Naathhannaalayamaayeedum-gaathratthe aaghoshichu.

Svargapure ekasuthan chaare-nirgathayaayolle!Kanye!
Lokatthodaardrathayundaavaan-naathhanodarththhikkenam nee
/tsamrakshanamidayanmaarkkum
Thejassaachaaryanmaarkkum
/tpakvatha shemmaashanmaarkkum
Ninnaall ghoshichorkkellaam-mochanavum siddhikkenam.
